org.promasi.model
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  org.promasi.model.Task

public class Task
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a task of a project. A task can be for example :

  • develop(start writing code)
  • review(review the code in order to find bugs)
etc.

Author:
eddiefullmetal
